sourcesContent:
{{ task.name }}

Due Date: {{ task.dueDate | date }}

Priority: {{ task.priority }}

Status: {{ task.status }}

import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-viewtasks', templateUrl: './viewtasks.component.html', styleUrls: ['./viewtasks.component.css'] }) export class ViewtasksComponent { tasks:any editTask(id:number){ } deleteTask(id:number){ } }
